charges.charge_description: Indictment 12/15/10: 18:471 and 18:2 Manufacturing counterfeit and altered Federal Reserve Notes(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Count 1. Imprisonment for 30 months. Remanded to custody. Two years supervised release. with special conditions. $100 special assessment. $2,000 restitution, joint and several. Deft shall surrender $3,173,20; $2,000 is to be applied to restitution and $100 to be applied to special assessment.

charges.charge_description: Indictment 12/15/10: 18:472 and 18:2 Passing/uttering counterfeit and altered Federal Reserve Notes(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2 dismissed on motion by Govt.

charges.charge_description: Indictment 12/15/10: 18:471 and 18:2 Manufacturing counterfeit and altered Federal Reserve Notes(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Count 1. Imprisonment for time served. Remanded to custody. Two years supervised release. with special conditions. $100 special assessment. $2,000 Joint and several restitution in the amount of $2,000. Deft agreed in the Plea Agreement to surrender $3,173.20. The deft and the Govt are ordered to apply $2,000 of the surrendered funds toward the $2,000 restitution and apply $100 toward the special assessment.

charges.charge_description: Indictment 12/15/10: 18:472 and 18:2 Passing/uttering counterfeit and altered Federal Reserve Notes(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2 dismissed on motion by Govt.

charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Count 1. Imprisonment for 30 months. Remanded to custody. Deft shall surrender $3,173.20; $2,000 is to be applied to restitution and $100 to be applied to special assessment.

charges.charge_description: Indictment 12/15/10: 18:472 and 18:2 Passing/uttering counterfeit and altered Federal Reserve Notes(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2 dismissed on motion by Govt.
